original_text: Jesus said to him, ‘You believe because you have seen me. Other people have not seen me, but they do believe in me. God is really happy with those people.’
korean_text: 예수께서 이르시되 너는 나를 본 고로 믿느냐 보지 못하고 믿는 자들은 복되도다 하시니라

sentences.original_text: 'You believe because you have seen me
Other people have not seen me
but they do believe in me
God is really happy with those people.'
